name: Cat
description: Small carnivorous mammals characterized by flexible bodies, quick reflexes, and sharp retractable claws.

name: Dog
description: Domesticated carnivores of the family Canidae, known for their loyalty and diverse range of breeds and sizes.

name: Hamster
description: Small rodents belonging to the subfamily Cricetinae, often kept as house pets and known for their cheek pouches.

name: Lizard
description: A widespread group of squamate reptiles, ranging from small geckos to larger monitors, typically with scaly skin.

name: Rabbit
description: Small mammals in the family Leporidae, known for their long ears, powerful hind legs, and social nature.
